metadata.description: Personal Claude Code plugins: publication workflows, research paper management, fiction worldbuilding, and repository management

plugins.name: pub-pipeline
plugins.description: Unified publication pipeline: R packages (CRAN/JOSS/JSS), Python packages (PyPI), and books (Amazon KDP)

plugins.name: papermill
plugins.description: Research paper lifecycle management — thesis refinement, literature surveys, experimental design, editorial review, and publication venue matching

plugins.name: worldsmith
plugins.description: Documentation-first worldbuilding methodology for fiction projects. The Silmarillion approach: docs ARE the world, story text derives from them.

plugins.name: mf
plugins.description: Metafunctor site management — blog architecture, content workflows, mf CLI, and crier cross-posting

plugins.name: repoindex
plugins.description: Collection-aware repository intelligence — query, analyze, and maintain your git repository collection
